adHeader: Color & Haircut by Color & Cut Specialist
adDetails: I'm a cut and color specialist, and nothing can make me happier than seeing a customer satisfied with my services. I just moved to a new place, and having a experience of working with salons for the past 10 years. * Try New Style with the promotion Feel free to call me to schedule an Appointment/Consultation. Reach me on my cell show contact info and in case if i missed the call leave me your name and phone number, I will return the call quickly.
